裿字的基本解释

裿
yǐ
〔裿??（
n?）〕衣好貌。

裿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐ］
［《集韻》隱綺切，上紙，影。］
(1)衣貌。
(2)同“倚”。
[②]［qǐ］
［《集韻》去倚切，上紙，溪。］
好；衣好貌。

裿字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裿； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1119第23
【集韻】去倚切，音綺。【博雅】襌襦謂之襜裿。　又隱綺切，音倚。【類篇】裿䘦，衣貌。【玉篇】好也。

考證：〔【博雅】襜襦謂之襜裿〕　謹照原文襜襦改襌襦。
裿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
裿字的起名意思

衣好貌。

裿
Basic explanation of words
裿
yǐ
〔裿?? (
n?)] The clothes look good.
裿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [qǐ]
["Ji Yun" hidden beautifully cut, on paper, shadow. ]
(1) Clothing appearance.
(2) Same as "Reliance".
[②]［qǐ］
["Ji Yun" go to Yi cut, put paper, stream. ]
Good; the clothes look good.
裿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　裿; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1119 Page 23
【Ji Yun】Go to lean and cut, sound Qi. [Bo Ya] Xiaoxu is called Xiaoxu.　It's faintly cut again, and the sound leans against it. 【Classes】裿䘦, clothing appearance. [Jade articles] Good too. Textual research: 〔【Bo Ya】襜襦是襜裿] 　 I would like to change the 襜襦 according to the original text.
